conditionsAttendingText: E-learning offers the flexibility to learn from anywhere at any time, which is particularly beneficial for students with diverse schedules. However, it requires discipline and time management skills to stay on track. Access to reliable technology and internet is also crucial to ensure uninterrupted learning.
termsUseText: By using our e-learning platform, you agree to adhere to our guidelines which include respectful communication, academic integrity, and active participation in course activities. Misuse of the platform, such as sharing prohibited content or engaging in dishonest behavior, may result in account suspension or termination.
